> [balancer73](#comment_1_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): In 2003 (in Russia :) ) it cost about $20. As it is now, I do not know. That aerobatics/skydive club near Moscow, where I went, had already closed many years ago..
